about_the_game:
What awaits the players:

*A unique combination of a visual novel with a 3D sea adventure on your own ship!

*About 6+ hours of gameplay

*4 heroines, each with a unique story and love line

*Dozens of different backgrounds

* Various 2d/3d locations, the ability to improve your own ship, take direct part in dangerous battles

*More than a hundred thousand words

The player will take part in 3-person battles where, driving his submarine, he must destroy enemy ships and fulfill the tasks set by the command

History

In the middle of the endless waters of the Pacific Ocean, not far from the shores of the Korean Peninsula, there is a small piece of land that this story will tell about. A small island that often changed hands, all the hegemons of the region sought to annex it to their possessions. A beautiful military base through which all the important sea routes of the region passed. The last country to seize the island was the Russian Empire. In order to strengthen his power and build fortifications, many citizens were brought to him from inside the crane. It so happened that the largest percentage of new residents of the island were Ukrainians. When Russia fell into the chaos of civil war, the Ukrainians realized that this was a chance and proclaimed the Ukrainian Republic on the island. The Bolsheviks who came to power did not accept the loss and tried to seize the island, but were defeated and signed a peace agreement. Several dozen years have passed since that time. No one cared about a piece of land with a population of several hundred thousand souls. To no one except the conquerors of losers...

You are a young naval officer who has just graduated from the US Naval Academy. As the son of an immigrant, your idea of ​​your own country was built only on your parents' stories. Nevertheless, now you are free to make your own choice and have decided to defend the small Ukrainian state. Arriving on the island - you immediately volunteered for service.
However, not everything is so simple. Island Ukraine is truly a magical place, which cannot be said about its armed forces. The fleet of the Isle, to which you are assigned as an officer, suffers from a chronic lack of finances and resources. And therefore, instead of a wonderful warship, you are given under command only...an old submarine, almost from the time of the First World War. And also 4 crew members.

Your task as the Captain is to repair the boat, get to know the crew and provide them with what they need. To prevent quarrels in the team, and to be ready to carry out the most difficult orders of the command. Meanwhile, a new war with the Reds is increasingly looming on the horizon.

Unforgettable adventures in ancient temples, mysterious naval bases, and unsunk enemy ships await you. Fight pirates, pump up a submarine, learn the hard history of each member of your crew, and also....drink tea with goodies! Remember, the order must be fulfilled!
Heroines


Nastya is your intercessor. She is responsible for everything and everyone. Frankly, it would be much more difficult for you as the Captain without her. Nastya will solve any problem, settle any conflict. And outside the port, she is an ordinary girl who likes to help her parents in the family bakery. Nastya - will follow you even into hell, and in difficult moments will put her own shoulder. However, perhaps she would like to interact with her Captain a little more? Will you agree to this, or will you reject any unconstitutional relationship on the boat?


Dasha is a mechanic and gunsmith. A hot-tempered girl who does not put a finger in her mouth. She is not held back by titles or status and will always say what she thinks. Meanwhile, the entire technical part of your submarine rests entirely on her slender shoulders. So if you want your vessel not to fall apart, it is better not to fight with it. In his free time from work, he likes to drink, and that is why he is a regular customer of the "Seahorse" bar, where he drinks beer all day long. But isn't she trying to drown her own loneliness in a mug of alcohol? The difficult 30s took away all her family, and she herself ended up in a Soviet concentration camp, from where she escaped after walking hundreds of kilometers. Maybe this always cheerful girl wouldn't mind a friend? Or maybe not just a friend? It is up to you to decide how to support your crew member.


Yana is a scout and part-time ship commissioner of the island's Security Service. If Dasha can be compared to a burning volcano, Yana is her complete opposite. In the eyes of the girl, it would seem, the icy winds of Everest are howling. She knows nothing except statutory relations. It is rare when it is possible to get more than a few stingy words out of it. Her patriotism borders on fanaticism, and the devotion of the army and navy to the island knows no bounds. The girl devotes all her free time to work, no one can say for sure whether she rests at all. And yet, even such a metallic person has his secrets. She never talks about her past. Why? What skeletons does the girl hide in the closet. And are there any emotions left in her? You can try to find out, if you have enough spirit.


Olya is the last member of your small crew and performs the duties of a radio operator. The complete opposite of all past girls. A small, shy girl who loves reading more than anything else in the world. She spends all her free time in the library named after Taras Shevchenko. If you want to find it, just go to the library. But don't forget to take some goodies with you. What is this tea without cookies? However, books are not her only love, the girl simply adores various furry ones. She is literally ready to jump into the fire for them. When animals threaten the sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You are the captain of a submarine of a small Ukrainian island state, with a big baggage of dreams and a lot of problems. Sink enemy ships, explore mysterious abandoned bases, steal secret documents. Drink tea and don't forget to have fun. Your team is already waiting for you. To the Battle!
